location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.388 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter informing Malet of Kemball's communication (ff 207-08) to Commodore George Robinson, Commanding Officer Persian Gulf Squadron, of 'vessels of suspicious character' reported to be 'lurking' in the Gulf.
